pr_title: ISPN-11871 cli user command instead of user-tool

timeline.message: ISPN-11871 cli user command instead of user-tool

timeline.bodyText:
probably some link or reference to documentation/src/main/asciidoc/topics/proc_server_user_tool.adoc ?
Probably say the user is the command to use to create user/password that are able to access the REST endpoint...
timeline.author: pruivo
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -1,7 +1,7 @@
 [id='rest_security']
 = REST Authentication
-Configure authentication to the REST endpoint with the `bin/user-tool.sh`
-script in the {brandname} server distribution.
+Configure authentication to the REST endpoint with the {brandname} command line
+interface (CLI) and the **user create** command.
